thread.section_title: Hilton Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Location!!
thread.title_full: Excellent Location!! - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Susan M
title: Excellent Location!!
text: My family loved this hotel. It is located in an extremely convenient location to everything! Next to the Times Square subway station, so you can go anywhere. Within walking distance of the Empire State Building and Rockefeller Center. The rooms were clean and well maintained. The staff was friendly and knowledgable. Many great restaurants right outside the door of this hotel. We would stay here again.
